Frequently Asked Questions

What's included in the trip price?

All trips include accommodations, guided tours, transportation, and most meals. Flight tickets are not included.

When is the deposit due?

The deposit is due within 7 days of booking to secure your spot. The remaining balance is due 30 days before departure.

Can I get a refund?

We offer full refunds if you cancel 60 days before the trip. Cancellations within 60 days forfeit the deposit.

What if a trip is full?

You can join the waitlist and we'll notify you if a spot opens up. We also add dates based on demand.

Need More Information?

Contact our travel experts to customize your Ghana adventure
